author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, we demonstrate techniques around capturing gameplay to help generate motion for cinematics or even gameplay prototyping. 

Watch the video to learn how to use the Game Animation Sample Project to capture motion using Take Recorder, and then use Sequencer to create a few shots for a simple cinematic. Features covered include layered control rigs, time warps, deformers, trigger volumes, and ragdolls.

To find out more about the Gameplay Animation Sample Project, check out our website: dev.epicgames.com/documentation/unreal-engine/game-animation-sample-project-in-unreal-engine

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this video for an insight into how Moonshot Games used UE5 to create epic PvP space shooter ‘Wildgate’.

‘Wildgate’ brings a unique blend of style and substance to spacefaring fans of team-based shooters. 

The game, which is developed using Unreal Engine 5, offers action-packed emergent gameplay alongside explosive spaceship combat on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.

Players take on the roles of various Prospectors to form small crews as they venture into a hostile, unpredictable, and mysterious region of space in pursuit of an ancient relic known as the Artifact. Success requires cooperation and tactical mastery, with a whole lot of fun to be had along the way.

Find out how ‘Wildgate’ truly stands out from other titles in the genre, and which UE5 features helped the team at Moonshot achieve its ambitious goals for its debut title: https://epic.gm/ue-spotlight-wildgate

author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, we unlock the full potential of Chaos Cloth with an artist-friendly guide to creating a robust production-ready pipeline. 

Chaos Cloth is an Unreal Engine system that uses particle simulation to realistically simulate clothing and fabrics. It enables you to create clothing that moves and responds to stimuli (like wind) in a physically plausible way. 

Swing by and learn how to simulate high-quality cloth for real-time hero assets and cinematic sequences, using methods that blend efficiency with visual fidelity.

To find out more about Chaos Cloth, check out our website: dev.epicgames.com/community/learning/tutorials/OPM3/unreal-engine-chaos-cloth-tool-overview
